messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] does anyone remember who...
messages.msgSnippet: I thought that was the shirt material!  Good choice. SandraDodd@aol.com wrote:Does anyone remember who recommended I use the background art from this page
messages.messageBody:
I thought that was the shirt material! Good choice.

SandraDodd@... wrote:Does anyone remember who recommended I use the background art from this page
http://sandradodd.com/HippieShirt
as book cover art?

Because I did. <g>
And I wanted to thank that person.

The book's not yet for public consumption. I'm still waiting for a copy to
see if my corrections were sufficient to save me from shame (and if my
attempts to fix a few formatting glitches were successful). The cover, though, is
here:
http://sandradodd.com/puddlebook

and links to how to order might eventually be as well.

Meanwhile, buy Rue's book!
http://www.freechild.info/

Sandra
